snippet.title: molecules (PICO-8) 100% perfect playthrough
snippet.description:
Link: https://pocketfruit.itch.io/molecules

Here is a 100% perfect playthrough of the PICO-8 game 'molecules'. This is a very nice short puzzle game with awesome graphics. At first I didn't get the requirements for getting 'perfect' but it is actually quite easy. You even get a secret ending for getting the 100% rank. Very nice game.
